job_description: Are you daily press junkie? Are you passionate about digital publishing and media? Do you want to work together with the top notch web developers and software engineers? THIS IS YOUR CHANCE
job_requirements: We are looking for the individuals with:*Solid knowledge of C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, Ajax, CSS, DHTML, XML, SQL (Stored Procedure, View, Functions ect.), Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL*Willing to learn in fast paced dynamic multicultural environmentPlease be advised that we will test your skills and knowledge prior to making the decision to take you on board.
